data.name: Forged Legions
data.detailed_description:
Forged Legions is a competitive strategy RPG where you lead a party of death-sentenced mercenaries in their search for the starglass, a legendary trinket that grants its wielder mighty godpowers.

The gameplay consist of competitive matches on a real-time worldmap with turn-based battles.








  • Lead a group of medieval mercenaries in their hasty search for a legendary trinket.
  • Real-time strategy on an island full of lootable locations and enemy encounters with base building and territory control.
  • No magic spells – Turn-based battles with medieval equipment only.
  • No fixed unit classes – skills like "Split Skull" are defined by worn equipment.
  • Permadeath and injuries – only survivors will stay in your legion.
  • Use mighty godpowers like the Thunderbolt or Meteor Strike to turn the tide.
  • Units have unique backgrounds and traits, gain experience and level up.
  • Orchestral soundtrack.


Made by a single developer, Forged Legions is inspired by Overhype Studio's masterpiece Battle Brothers and Blizzard's classic Warcraft 3: The Frozen Throne. It aims to combine the deadly tactical combat and unit progression of BB with the real-time territory fights of WC3.

data.short_description: A competitive strategy RPG with turn-based combat. Build your base. Explore the island. Use mighty godpowers. Forge your legion of medieval warriors.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM, OpenGL 3.3 compatible
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: 3 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM, OpenGL 4.6 compatible
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Turn-based combat involves depictions of violence and gore.
